document_data.mainbody:
The Pegasus language was the racial language of pegasi.
Beyond pegasi themselves, Pegasus was a common secondary language among many members of Faer√ªns land dwelling elven subraces, such as the lythari, moon elves, sun elves, and wood elves.
Pegasus was also fairly common as a secondary language among druids devoted to certain nature deities. druids of Eldath, druids and druid/rangers of Mielikki, and the druids of Silvanus. Other forms of specialty priests in the Realms for whom Pegasus was a commonly known secondary language included the Eldathyn peacemen.
